description:
Taylor Swift Releases Full Version of New Song ‘Ready for It’泰勒新曲“Ready for It”完整版发行

Taylor Swift continued her disruption of Labor Day weekend by dropping the full version of her new song “Ready for It,” which she'd teased with a minute-long snippet during the lead-in to ESPN's Florida State vs. Alabama college football game late Saturday. The song is the second to be released from the singer's sixth studio album, “Reputation,” which is due Nov. 10.本周日是美国劳动节，而霉霉的新歌“Ready for It”注定又要打破这个平静的周末了。 上周六，娱乐体育节目电视网播出了弗罗里达州对阿拉巴马州的大学足球联赛，而霉霉却在比赛开场前的几分钟搞了个恶作剧。这首歌是霉霉第6张专辑《Reputation》的第二首发行歌曲。

More direct and pop-oriented than “Look What You Made Me Do,” the dark and bitter track she released late in August, this one is based around a throbbing bass line with plenty of Swift’s deft and interlocking melodies.霉霉曾在8月份出了一首“暗黑系”的新歌“Look What You Made Me Do”，相比之下，这首“Ready for It”更有针对性，曲风也更加流行化。整首歌以节奏感很强的贝斯音为底线，加入大量斯威夫特式灵动而连贯的旋律。

The video for “Look What You Made Me Do” video shattered streaming records after its world premiere on Sunday's MTV Video Music Awards.自从“Look What You Made Me Do”在周日的VMA颁奖典礼上进行首秀后，该歌曲在网上一炮走红。

The clip had the biggest debut of any video in YouTube history, clocking 43.2 million views in 24 hours, easily topping the previous record-holder, Psy's “Gentleman,” which racked up 36 million views in its first 24 hours.新歌MV发布24小时内，在社交媒体YouTube上的观看次数达到4320万次，一举打破此前“鸟叔”的《绅士》3800万次的纪录，创造YouTube史上的单日播放量纪录。

Swift's latest clip averaged over 30,000 views per minute in those first 24 hours, with hourly views reaching over 3 million views.霉霉新曲的剪辑在刚发行的24小时内,平均每分钟观看人数为3万人，每小时观看量超过了3百万。

（翻译：进击的Meredith）
